combobox.onselect: {cmd}(this); if(StringEquals(this, 'USA'), Set('_create_state', 'AL'), If(StringEquals(this, 'Canada') or StringEquals(this, 'Mexico'), Set('_create_state', '--'), Set('_create_state', '--')));

label.onshow: If(sys_useSteam, ClearText(), SetText('It is important that you provide a valid email address for your account to be activated'));

panel.name: info_section

panel.label: *This is the name that you will be identified by while in game.
*This code is used for Steam accounts only. It it used to verify that you've purchased Savage 2 on Steam.
Account created successfully!
-- IMPORTANT --
An email containing an activation link will be sent to your mailbox.
You must click on the link in that email before you can login and play.
Account created successfully!
You are now ready to login.
